Item Description: Are you looking to move your BC site to a new easy to manage CMS? Have you considered LightCMS? Let us give you a demo and help you with all your migration needs.

Are you looking to move your BC store to Shopify and it's modern e-commerce platform? We can help you get it done. We’ve migrated many Business Catalyst stores to Shopify and can you help you with all your migration needs.

Webflow is an easy to use web-based platform that we love working with. You can design sites visually and create stunning custom responsive websites with ease. They also have a feature similar to BC’s WebApps but even more powerful and easy to use. The code Webflow generates is clean and they even provide a portal for you to manage all your project and client sites. If you choose, you can enable client billing and markup the hosting rates and brand the control panel with your own name and logo. Schedule a free consultation so we can show you the power of Webflow.

Are you looking for a replacement for BC? Weebly Cloud might be a good alternative for you. With Weebly you design the sites visually in your browser with an easy to use drag and drop interface. In addition you can manage all your client websites, set your pricing and more in the Weebly Cloud Portal. Let us give you a tour of Weebly Cloud and show you how this could be the platform your move your websites to.

See a feature by feature comparison of BC vs. Weebly Cloud

Learn more about Weebly Cloud

WordPress is the most popular CMS platform on the market and for good reason. With an almost unlimited selection of WordPress themes and plugins and a large community of users, you can’t go wrong migrating your Business Catalyst website to WordPress

Utilizing the BC Exporter framework, AID+BC has migrated many sites from BC to WP and we can do the same for you. Our migration ssolution includes:

  • Migrating pages, page templates and all your assets (images, css, js)
  • Migrating not just your Web App data, but your Web App Structure as well
  • Migrating customers and mailing lists
  • Migrating all your existing URLs and metadata

Schedule a free consultation so we can get your site out of Business Catalyst and into WordPress.
Is Magento overly complicated for you to manage? Are you looking to migrate a Magento store into BC? We can help. We’ve migrated many magento stores to Business Catalyst.
Did your WordPress site get hacked? Are you looking to migrate a WordPress theme into BC? We can help. We’ve migrated many websites from WordPress to Business Catalyst.

Item Name: Yahoo! Store to Business Catalyst Migration
Item Description: Do you have an old Yahoo Store that is outdated and hard to work with? Are you spending hundreds of dollars each month for all the add-ons? We can help. We can migrate your old Yahoo Store to a brand new, responsive Business Catalyst store and save you thousands!
